Uses of Package
org.keycloak.cache

Packages that use org.keycloak.cache
Package
Description
org.keycloak.cache
 
  • Classes in org.keycloak.cache used by org.keycloak.cache
    Class
    Description
    AlternativeLookupProvider
     
    AlternativeLookupProviderFactory
     
    LocalCache
    A LocalCache should be used when a local, non-clustered, cache is required to optimise data access.
    LocalCacheConfiguration
    Configuration record that encapsulates all configuration required in order to create a LocalCache.
    LocalCacheConfiguration.Builder
    A builder class to simplify the creation of LocalCacheConfiguration objects.
    LocalCacheProvider
    A Provider to abstract the creation of local, non-clustered, in-memory caches from the underlying cache implementation.
    LocalCacheProviderFactory
